text: Johnny Lynas (18 January 1907 – 1988) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a winger for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1907 births Category:1988 deaths Category:People from Blantyre Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Shettleston F.C. players Category:Rutherglen Glencairn F.C. players Category:Bo'ness F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Third Lanark A.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Johnny Lynas
